login.title: 登录您的账户
login.emailInstructions: 请使用您注册时填写的电子邮箱作为登录名。
login.passwordInstructions: 如果您忘记密码，请点击下方的"忘记密码"链接进行重置。
login.termsAndConditions1: 我已阅读并接受拍卖行的
login.emailPlaceholder: 请输入您的电子邮箱地址
login.termsAgreement: I have read and accepted the {0}Auctioneers Terms and Conditions{1} and {2}Data Privacy Terms{3} and I agree to abide by them.

errors.badCredentials: We couldn't verify your account. Please check that you've entered the correct email and password. If you continue to have trouble, you can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link below, or contact us for more assistance.
errors.networkError: Connection problem. Please try again later.

register.title: 创建账户
register.instructions: 请完成以下注册信息以参加拍卖。
register.termsAcceptance: 我已阅读并接受拍卖行的<1>条款与条件</1>以及<3>数据隐私条款</3>，并同意遵守这些条款。
register.successMessage: 注册成功！系统将自动跳转至您的账户页面。

forgotPassword.title: 忘记密码
forgotPassword.instruction1: 请输入您的电子邮箱地址以接收密码重置链接。
forgotPassword.instruction2: 我们将向您的邮箱发送一封包含一次性重置链接的邮件。
forgotPassword.emailPlaceholder: 输入您的电子邮箱地址
forgotPassword.successMessage: 密码重置链接已发送至您的邮箱。
forgotPassword.errorMessage: 发送密码重置链接失败。请重试。

myAccount.noAddressesMessage: 为了参加拍卖，您需要填写地址以完成注册。请在下方表格中填写地址。
myAccount.connectionFailed: 无法连接到用户资料，请刷新页面以解决问题。如问题仍未解决，请联系技术团队。
myAccount.networkError: 网络问题导致加载账户信息失败，请刷新页面重试。如问题仍未解决，请联系技术团队。

myAccount.enterEmail: 输入您的电子邮箱地址

myAccount.phoneNumberInstructions: 请输入您的本地电话号码。完整的国际格式号码会显示在下方。
myAccount.enterShippingInstructions: Enter any special shipping instructions here
myAccount.enterProfessionalReferences: Please provide names of other auction companies you've worked with
myAccount.optInCommunications: I consent to receiving marketing communications and updates via email, SMS, and mail.

myCredit.creditStatusMessage: 暂无信用额度申请记录。
myCredit.pendingCreditStatusMessage: 您的信用额度申请{{amount}} 正在处理中。
myCredit.pendingCreditStatusMessageUnlimited: 您的信用额度申请{{amount}} 正在处理中。您当前的信用额度为无限。
myCredit.pendingCreditStatusMessageWithLimit: 您的信用额度申请{{amount}} 正在处理中。您的当前信用额度为{{approvedAmount}}。
myCredit.approvedCreditStatusMessageUnlimited: 您的信用额度不受限制。
myCredit.approvedButtonLabel: 发送新的信用额度申请
myCredit.approvedCreditStatusMessage: 您的信用额度申请 {{amount_request}} 已获批准，您的信用额度为 {{amount}}。
myCredit.rejectedCreditStatusMessage: 您的信用额度申请已被拒绝。
myCredit.instructions: 您希望申请多少信用额度？一旦达到此限额，您将无法继续出价。
myCredit.noCommasOrDecimals: 请勿使用逗号或小数点。
myCredit.maxBidLimitsHelp: In this section you can set your own limit to any bidder number you have. Limiting the bids will cut off your potential winnings at that number so you don't end up winning more than you have planned on spending.
myCredit.approvedCreditStatusMessageModified: Following review, your credit request of {{amount_request}} has been set to {{current_amount}}.
myCredit.creditRequestDescription: Your credit request for {{amount}} has been submitted.
myCredit.rejectedCreditStatusMessageUnlimited: Your credit request has been rejected. You have unlimited credit.

myBids.navigateToSaleOrItemPage: 跳转至拍卖或拍品页面
myBids.clickOnSaleName: 点击上方拍卖名称查看该场拍卖的出价与信用额度。
myBids.filterNotHighest: Items where I'm not the highest bidder
myBids.cannotEditGroup: Or Bid Group editing is only available for active items
myBids.groupRemoved: Item removed from Or Bid Group
myBids.groupAssigned: Item assigned to Or Bid Group {group}
myBids.groupUpdateError: Failed to update Or Bid Group

orGroupExplanation.title: OR Bids Group
orGroupExplanation.main: Add lots to a group (A-J) when you want to win only one item. Once you win an item in the group, your other group bids are cancelled'
orGroupExplanation.example: Example: If lots 1, 2, 3 are in Group A and you win lot 1, your bids on lots 2 and 3 will be automatically cancelled

myBids.groupHasClosedItems: Cannot add to this group - it contains closed items
myBids.duplicatedAmountTooltip: A previous bid for the same amount has already been placed for this lot
myBids.deletedByGroupTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]This bid was automatically cancelled because you won another lot in the same Or Bids group

bid.rejectedMailAfterSetLastFloor: 已拒绝，价格设定为现场出价

biddingInfo.liveCreditDescription: 用于网络竞拍的信用额度，仅适用于在线竞标者。
biddingInfo.mailCreditDescription: 用于邮件出价的信用额度。例如，信用额度为 €100 的竞标者无法成功竞拍起拍价为 €200 的拍品。请注意，竞标者可以提交高于信用额度的邮件出价，但不能赢得拍品。
biddingInfo.maxBidDescription: 在线竞标者的出价上限。竞标者也可以通过“我的账户”页面修改其出价上限。
biddingInfo.openingPriceDescription: 重新出价前，请确保已保存起拍价格。
biddingInfo.reKnockDownDescription: 重新出价后，服务器将重新计算获胜出价。如果找到获胜出价，状态将变为“已售出”，否则为“未售出”。请确保最高出价等于或高于开拍价。

legacy.AgreedWithTerms: 我已阅读并接受拍卖行的条款和条件和数据隐私条款，并同意遵守相关规定。
legacy.CreditIsRequiredForAgentBids: 提交代理出价前，您必须设定信用额度。点击这里设置信用额度。
legacy.CreditIsRequiredForMailBids: 提交邮件出价前，您必须设定并获得批准的信用额度。点击这里设置信用额度。
legacy.CreditIsRequiredButPendingForMailBids: 提交邮件出价前，您必须设定并获得批准的信用额度。目前您的信用额度申请正在审核中。点击这里查看或更新信用额度申请。
ForgotPasswordInstructions: 请输入您账户绑定的电子邮箱地址。
我们将向您发送一封包含一次性重置链接的邮件。
LoginInstructions: 请使用您注册时填写的电子邮件作为登录名。
如果忘记密码，请使用下方的“忘记密码”链接进行重置。
RegisterInstructions: 请完成全部注册以参与拍卖。
带 * 的字段为必填项。
legacy.ResetPasswordSuccess: 您的密码已重置。请使用页面右上角的链接登录，或点击这里直接登录。
legacy.BidderLimitNote: 请注意，该限制仅适用于您的书面出价（包括通过在线目录提交的出价）
legacy.BidderLimitDescription: 请输入您的最高出价金额（不包括佣金和其他费用）。请注意，实际成交金额可能会有约10%的偏差。
legacy.CreditRequest: 申请在线竞拍信用额度
legacy.CreditRequestDescription: 您想申请多少信用额度？一旦达到信用上限，您将无法继续出价。
legacy.CreditRequestPending: 感谢您的信用申请。工作人员将尽快审查您的请求。
legacy.CreditUnlimited: 您的信用额度为无限制。

CurrentCreditAndPending.Unlimited: 您当前的信用额度为无限制

CurrentMaximum.Unlimited: 您当前的最高出价为无限制

userInterests.title: My Interests
userInterests.pageDescription: Help us understand your collecting interests! Add categories of items you'd like to follow, and we'll notify you when matching items become available in our auctions. You can always adjust your preferences here.
userInterests.searchInstructions: Use the search box below to find and add categories that interest you. You can search by typing any part of the category path (e.g., 'Stamps', 'Germany', or '1900'). Categories where you've previously bid will remain in your list even when inactive, and you can reactivate them at any time using the search. Categories without bids will be removed when deactivated.
userInterests.noSearchResults: No matching categories found. Try different search terms.
userInterests.browseExplanation: View items that match your selected categories of interest. The items will be automatically filtered based on your active categories.

myFavorites.noFavorites: You have not added any lots to your favorites yet.
myFavorites.addFavoritesHint: Browse auctions and click the heart icon to add lots to your favorites.
myFavorites.noMatchingFavorites: No favorites match your current filters.
myFavorites.noFavoritesInSale: You have no favorite lots in this sale.
myFavorites.title: Title
myFavorites.selectMoreItems: Select at least 2 items to compare
myFavorites.addTooltip: Click this button to add this item to your list of favorite items
myFavorites.removeTooltip: Click this button to remove the item from your favorite list
myFavorites.addSuccess: Lot has been added to your favorites
myFavorites.removeSuccess: Lot has been removed from your favorites
myFavorites.loginRequired: Please login to add items to favorites
